name: You're A-Clone
description:
Now with 50% more clones!!

Programming, Game Design, Level Design, Music and SFX: alfy

https://linktr.ee/alfy

Art, Level Designs: BirdButtocks

https://twitter.com/Bird_Buttocks

Game Design and Quality Consultant: Yowlife 
https://www.youtube.com/c/YowLife

and thanks to everyone that contributed Ideas and Testing


Controls: Keyboard: A-D: Horizontal Movement Space: Jump E or Keypad 2 : Interact R or Keypad 1: Spawn Clones Left-Right Arrow Keys: Switch Clones Q or Keypad 3: Pick up Clone Tab: Reset Level Esc: Pause Controller: (Xbox Layout) Left Stick: Horizontal Movement A Button: Jump X Button: Spawn Clones B Button: Pick Up Clone Y Button: Interact Shoulder Buttons: Switch Clones Select: Reset Level Start: Pause

pro-tip: pressing Esc during the intro sequence drops you at the first level

pro-tip 2: the third key might or might not exist
